full-exterior-detail.name: Full Exterior Detail

Clay bar treatment for bonded contaminants
Wheel, tire, and wheel-well deep clean
Surface prep for polishing or coating

full-interior-detail.name: Full Interior Detail
full-interior-detail.description: Deep interior cleaning and rejuvenation of every surface.
full-interior-detail.explanation: Removes embedded dirt, allergens, and odors from carpets, seats, and hard surfaces to restore a fresh, like-new cabin environment.

Steam cleaning and shampoo extraction as needed
Wipe-down of all plastics, vinyl, and leather
Streak-free glass cleaning inside and out

fallout-removal.explanation: Specialized decontamination that dissolves metallic contaminants that washing and claying alone cannot fully remove, preventing long-term paint damage.
features: Safe for paint, glass, and wheels

Tape masking of sensitive edges and trim
